name: Amazon Comprehend

pricing.model: Pay-as-you-go based on text units (1 unit = 100 characters), 3 unit minimum per request. Free tier available.

Real-time Analysis (Standard).Applies To: Entity Recognition, Sentiment Analysis, Key Phrase Extraction, Language Detection, PII Detection, Event Detection (per type), Targeted Sentiment

Comprehend Custom (Training).Notes: For Custom Classification and Custom Entity Recognition models.

Comprehend Custom (Inference - Real-time.Price per Endpoint Hour: Varies by instance type (Starts around $0.50/hr + data processing costs based on traffic, requires provisioned capacity). Contact AWS Sales for details.
Comprehend Custom (Inference - Real-time.Notes: Pricing involves endpoint uptime cost plus per-character processing cost similar to async, scaled by endpoint configuration.

pricing.overall_notes: Prices verified against US East (N. Virginia) region on 2025-03-31. Free tier: 50K units (5M chars) per month for 12 months for several standard APIs. Custom Comprehend has separate training/inference costs. Check official pricing page for specifics, regional variations, and potential volume discounts beyond listed tiers. Pricing source: https://aws.amazon.com/comprehend/pricing/

description: Amazon Comprehend is a natural language processing (NLP) service that uses machine learning to uncover insights and relationships in text. It provides pre-trained models for common NLP tasks like entity recognition, sentiment analysis, key phrase extraction, language detection, topic modeling, and PII redaction. The service also offers custom model capabilities through AutoML, allowing users to train specialized models for document classification and custom entity recognition without ML expertise. Comprehend integrates with other AWS services and can process documents in various formats including PDF and Word files.
